reliability.title: Reliability by design
reliability.subtitle: No magic claims: only verifiable behaviours already in production.
reliability.b1desc: Orders and bookings with idempotent key to avoid duplicates on retry.
reliability.b2desc: Cron jobs with per-shop lock to avoid concurrent runs.
reliability.b3desc: Test mode: no real data, push suppressed, isolated and cleanable data.
reliability.b4desc: Handling expired or invalid subscriptions without cascade errors.
reliability.b5desc: Deploy per shop with isolated branding, no data leakage between tenants.
reliability.b6desc: Pre-release checklist and runbooks for repeatable checks.

pricingTeaser.title: Transparent plans
pricingTeaser.subtitle: We don't sell cheap plans. If you want the bare minimum, we're not it — but if you want quality and control, we have two clear options.

faqItems.a1: Base setup takes about 1–2 working days. Full configuration can take 3–5 days depending on complexity.
faqItems.a2: Yes, we support importing customers, services and booking history from existing systems. Contact us to evaluate migration.
faqItems.a3: The client app runs as an installable PWA and supports offline use for viewing bookings and profile.
faqItems.a4: We currently support integrations with Satispay and other gateways. We can evaluate custom integrations on request.
faqItems.q5: Is there a limit on the number of bookings?
faqItems.a5: No. Plans differ by number of staff, additional shops and advanced features.
faqItems.a6: Email support for all plans. MAX gives you priority when you get in touch.
faqItems.a7: Yes, all plans include custom colours, logo and app icon. Higher plans include custom domain.
faqItems.a8: We use encryption, daily automated backups and GDPR compliance. Data is hosted on EU infrastructure.
faqItems.q9: What if I want to change plan?
faqItems.a9: You can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Changes apply to the next billing cycle.
faqItems.a10: Yes, all new customers get dedicated support during the first few weeks for a smooth launch.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Two plans, zero confusion. Quality and control for your business: PRO for a single location, MAX for multi-site and assisted setup.
pricing.footer: One-time setup + monthly fee. No hidden costs, no lock-in.
pricing.setupIncludes: Setup includes: deploy, PWA branding (manifest, icons), initial config, service seed data, and go-live checklist.

faq.q1: What does the one-time setup include?
faq.a1: App deploy, PWA branding (manifest, icons, service worker), initial config, base services setup, and go-live checklist. No surprises.
faq.q2: Can I switch between PRO and MAX?
faq.a2: Yes. You can upgrade or downgrade any time; changes apply to the next billing cycle.
faq.a3: One-time setup at activation and monthly fee billed in advance. Clear invoicing, no lock-in.
